message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product, and I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm thinking of a price around $9,500. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,200. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, and I want to find a price that works for both of us.  How about we meet halfway and settle on $8,850?
I appreciate the effort to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. Would you be willing to come down to this price?
